findings.title: Variables are not checked
findings.description: _owners_size variable is not checked, it is recommended to add a require statement to ensure its validity.

findings.title: Validation can be bypassed
findings.description: The validation check in the isContract function can be bypassed when the contract is constructing and code is null, allowing an attacker to manipulate the address type.

findings.title: Redundant code
findings.description: Arguments in the Verify method are of type uint256[8], but the actual code uses only the values 0-4.
findings.function: verify(address[2] calldata tokens, uint256[8] calldata arguments)
